duck: A subsequence, substring, prefix or suffix of a string is a subsequence of the symbols in a string, where the order of the elements is preserved.

wiki.text:
A 'subsequence', 'substring', 'prefix' or 'suffix' of a string is a subsequence
of the symbols in a string, where the order of the elements is preserved. In
this context, the terms string and [[sequence]] have the same meaning.
wiki.title: substring
